description:
Toriko searches for more training ingredients, Komatsu impresses his boss with dazzling new cooking techniques, and Ichiryu comes face-to-face with an old nemesis!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choujou Taiketsu! Ichiryuu Tai Bishokukai Midora!
Showdown at the Summit! Ichiryu vs. Midora of the Gourmet Corp.!
頂上対決! 一龍VS[たい]美食會・三虎!
